description: Use csm-data to send a file to a workspace inside the API

CSM_FILE_PATH.description: Path to the file to send as a workspace file

CSM_API_URL.description: The URL to a Cosmo Tech API instance

CSM_API_KEY.description: An API key defined during the setup of the API instance granting access to the Run/data/send endpoint

CSM_API_KEY_HEADER.description: The header key required to use the API key previously defined

CSM_ORGANIZATION_ID.description: An organization id for the Cosmo Tech API

CSM_WORKSPACE_ID.description: A workspace id for the Cosmo Tech API

CSM_WORKSPACE_PATH.description: Path inside the workspace to store the file (end with '/' for a folder))
